environmentalSimulator
Class Map

java.lang.Object
  environmentalSimulator.Map

public class Map
extends java.lang.Object

This class represents the agregation of all of the meteorological phenomena and the topographic elements. It will gather all of the localized phenomena, the vertical profile and the turbulences, sum each contribution and create a wind vector to send through the IVY bus.
